title: MyAirFire
about: a mobile application used to make ticket reservations, with many features that make it easier for customers to order.

title: Si DARAHKU
about: si DARAHKU is an application used to find the location of hospitals that facilitate blood donation, and to find a place to donate blood for free.

title: Attendance Sys
about: A simple application used by teachers to take attendance for students who have just arrived.

title: Literctarsa
about: A website used by children to search for learning books and recognize animal names with the help of photos and videos.
